content: row next 4 row *k1 p1 k4 p1 repeat from * 4 times k1 p1 k4 bind off loosely proceed to thumb instructions below thumb remove stitches from stitch holder and place evenly over 3 dpns knit 13 stitches pick up and knit 2 stitches in the gap where the thumb and hand meet knit 2 more row bind off loosely sew ends with tapestry needle
